Title.Language: Doxology for St. John the Evangelist

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Evangelist:

Text.Language: Iwann/c piparyenoc: p~s/ri n~Zebedeoc: e~bol qen nirem m~B/dcaide: qen t~vul/ n~te Zebolon.
John the celibate, the Son of Zebedee, a native of Bethsaida, from the tribe of Zebulun.
يوحنا البتول ابن زبدى من أهل بيت صيدا من سبط زبولون.
Afcwtp m~mof n~je P,#c#: afe~roumay/t/c naf: ouoh pia~poctoloc: nafmei m~mof e~masw.
Christ has chosen him, and made him a disciple for Himself, and also an apostle, he loved Him very much.
اختاره المسيح وصيره تلميذا له ورسولا وكان يحبه جدا.
Nyof on menenca pid/pnon: afrwteb m~mof e~h~r/i e~jen: y~mectenh/t m~pencwt/r: ouoh afjoc nim v/eynat/ik.
He also after dinner, rested upon the shoulder, of our Savior and said to him, "Who will betray You?"
وهو أيضا بعد العشاء اتكأ على صدر مخلصنا وقال من هو الذي يسلمك.
Nyof on e~tafcaji eyb/tf: n~je P,#c# qen rwf e#y#u#: je e~swp aisanouws e~,af: e~vai sa]i~ a~qok n~ywk.
Christ has spoken of you, through His holy mouth, "If I will that he remain till I come, what is that to you?"
وهو أيضا الذي تكلم من أجله المسيح بفمه الطاهر إذا أردت أن أجعله يبقى لحين مجيئى فماذا لك.
Ouoh menenca ce n~rompi: e~]a~nactacic e#y#u#: afc~qai m~pefeuaggelion: afhiwis m~mof qen pikocmoc.
And after sixty years, from the Holy Resurrection, he wrote his Gospel, and preached to the world.
وبعد ستين سنة للقيامة المقدسة كتب إنجيله وكرز به في العالم.
<ere nak w~ piparyenoc: ,ere pieuaggelict/c: ,ere pia~poctoloc: n~te P,#c# ouoh may/t/c.
Hail to you O celibate, hail to the Evangelist, hail to the apostle, of Christ the disciple.
السلام لك أيها البتول السلام للانجيلى السلام لرسول المسيح وتلميذه.
Wouniatk qen oumeym/i: w~ pimenrit n~te P,#c#: Iwann/c picwtp m~m/i: p~s/ri n~Zebedeoc.
Blessed are you indeed, O beloved of Christ, John the truly chosen one, the Son of Zebedee.
طوباك بالحقيقة ياحبيب المسيح يوحنا المختار الحقيقي ابن زبدى.
